channel.title: [Delta] RuneScape 2006 remake
channel.description:
Yes i know there are lots of remakes but i just like to code :P
Base: Cleaned delta
Developers: -Me :D
If you would like to help please pm me
Few things about the server: -The server keeps clean by putting skills, and large amount of codes (like item-on-item) in new classes, the client.java is currently 380kb, and on a normal server its around 600-700kb -rares will be spreaded exactly as RuneScape did it. -there will be a good economy -there will be low drop rates -there will be low xp rates
What to do (what i currently can think off):
-Redo melee -Redo Range -Redo mage -Npc clipping (done 10%) -player clipping -combat timers -anims on weapons -tutorial island (just started working on) -all non-combat skills work (long way to go :P) -quests -requirements for quests,weapons etc -spawn all npcs -website from runescape at 2006 (80%) -ore prospecting -random events -all shops -sheep shearing -cow milking -doors -axe in wood at chickens work -item spawns (like leather gloves at edgeville) -clue scrolls -low drop rates -low xp rates -cabage picking -karambja boat (costs 30gp) -giving 15 bananas at karambja for 30gp -fight caves (63 waves) -npc drops -all agility objects work -brimhaven dung (875gp) -axe required for roots in brimhaven dung -anti-dragon shield for dragons -all potions work -potion combining -dragon sq shield making with right and left half -crystal key + chest -draynor manor front door can only be used to go in, not out -attacking trees at draynor manor -al-kharid door costs 10gp, exept if you did the quest. -tanning (costs money) -duelling and staking -teleport items work (like duelling ring) -correct runes for spells -barrows -barrows degrading -bob can fix barrows -castle wars + rewards -banana trees works -low barrow reward rate -puzzle at barrows chest room
Adding more soon...
Pictures:
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/290ue75.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2qd9xyg.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/978zmr.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/29le4pc.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/fth4dz.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/svp2ds.jpg[/img]
More coming soon...
[size=10pt]Updates:[/size]
[code]-Worked on fletching, includes making arrows and stringing bows. (80% completed) -Worked on herblore (10% completed) -Putted item-on-objects in a new class -Putted item-on-item in a new class -Putted few misc methods in a new class -Client.java size reduced to 392kb -jugs, watering cans, buckets, vials, bowls, cups and waterskins can be filled at every water source in the server -all gems can be crafted -worked on cooking abit -worked on herblore abit (now 40% completed) -client.java size reduced to 380kb -Cleaned the process, player and playerhandler classes -Added flax picking -Added flax spinning -Added the base for Cook's Assistant -Added Woodcutting base (70% completed) -Fixed Rollbacks -Added quest points -Worked on Herblore (60% completed) -Fixed a server crash -Cleaned client.java abit -Fixed high alch -Added flour making -Added the ability to make soft clay[/code]

item.title: [Delta] RuneScape 2006 remake
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“Squirt Ltd, post:17, topic:419018”]nice survar but always keep this in mind:

bigger client.java = bigger dick[/quote]Only if the serber is a mutation of winterLove. For all properly written servers, the Client class should only handle properties and methods associated with that session instance with the game client.

Read full topic

item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

halflive9:

I wish you good luck. Don’t put everything in client.java. Try to make seperate files.

Not much goes in client.java anymore there are new classes like itemonitem, itemonobject, objectfirstclick, secondclick etc

@enzo42 wrote:

Kracklez:

I believe all you noobs just want to get famous by attempting to not be original, and make a remake of what has already been done…

your a moron

item.title: [Delta] RuneScape 2006 remake
item.dc:creator: @enzo42 enzo42
item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

burizo:

I support. I’m also very inspired. I’m a veteran RuneScape player, since 2003. I’ve kept an eye on these forums for years. Point is, I know old RuneScape. I want in.

Thanks still working, currently putting stuff from client.java in new classes the client.java is 380 kb atm

edit: going to do homework etc and then im probably going to add some sounds/music to get the awesome memories back

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] RuneScape 2006 remake
item.dc:creator: @enzo42 enzo42
item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

Yes i know there are lots of remakes but i just like to code

Base: Cleaned delta

Developers:
-Me

If you would like to help please pm me

Few things about the server:
-The server keeps clean by putting skills, and large amount of codes (like item-on-item) in new classes, the client.java is currently 380kb, and on a normal server its around 600-700kb
-rares will be spreaded exactly as RuneScape did it.
-there will be a good economy
-there will be low drop rates
-there will be low xp rates

What to do (what i currently can think off):

-Redo melee
-Redo Range
-Redo mage
-Npc clipping (done 10%)
-player clipping
-combat timers
-anims on weapons
-tutorial island (just started working on)
-all non-combat skills work (long way to go :P)
-quests
-requirements for quests,weapons etc
-spawn all npcs
-website from runescape at 2006 (80%)
-ore prospecting
-random events
-all shops
-sheep shearing
-cow milking
-doors
-axe in wood at chickens work
-item spawns (like leather gloves at edgeville)
-clue scrolls
-low drop rates
-low xp rates
-cabage picking
-karambja boat (costs 30gp)
-giving 15 bananas at karambja for 30gp
-fight caves (63 waves)
-npc drops
-all agility objects work
-brimhaven dung (875gp)
-axe required for roots in brimhaven dung
-anti-dragon shield for dragons
-all potions work
-potion combining
-dragon sq shield making with right and left half
-crystal key + chest
-draynor manor front door can only be used to go in, not out
-attacking trees at draynor manor
-al-kharid door costs 10gp, exept if you did the quest.
-tanning (costs money)
-duelling and staking
-teleport items work (like duelling ring)
-correct runes for spells
-barrows
-barrows degrading
-bob can fix barrows
-castle wars + rewards
-banana trees works
-low barrow reward rate
-puzzle at barrows chest room

Adding more soon…

Pictures:

290ue75.jpg758×500

svp2ds.jpg760×498

More coming soon…

[size=10pt]Updates:[/size]

-Worked on fletching, includes making arrows and stringing bows. (80% completed) -Worked on herblore (10% completed) -Putted item-on-objects in a new class -Putted item-on-item in a new class -Putted few misc methods in a new class -Client.java size reduced to 392kb -jugs, watering cans, buckets, vials, bowls, cups and waterskins can be filled at every water source in the server -all gems can be crafted -worked on cooking abit -worked on herblore abit (now 40% completed) -client.java size reduced to 380kb -Cleaned the process, player and playerhandler classes -Added flax picking -Added flax spinning -Added the base for Cook's Assistant -Added Woodcutting base (70% completed) -Fixed Rollbacks -Added quest points -Worked on Herblore (60% completed) -Fixed a server crash -Cleaned client.java abit -Fixed high alch -Added flour making -Added the ability to make soft clay
